attributes.action: Introduce Verbal Examinations to School to particular subjects.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As all exams (Excluding languages) are written examinations, Verbal examinations we feel would benefit students at school/college/University, as speaking in day to day jobs is one of the main factors of having a career. It is unfair that people who cannot write as well as they can speak are pigeon holed into one particular way of examination, even though it isn’t there strength.
